articles.description: Her Majesty revealed that  fighting coronavirus in February has left her 'exhausted' in a video call with NHS staff and patients last week.
articles.content:
The 'very tired' Queen will limit her Platinum Jubilee appearances to 'just a few' events after battling covid two months ago and ongoing mobility problems, a royal expert warned today.
Her Majesty … [+12758 chars]
